home.desc-assessment: Record your organization's environmental sustainability practices.
home.desc-best-practices: Learn about the recommended environmental sustainability practices in your industry segment.
home.desc-history: View recorded history of your organization's environmental sustainability practices.

tab1.intro-xs: Describe and submit your targets. Or see what other organizations in your industry are doing by selecting the Benchmarking tab.
tab1.title: Targets

tab2.intro: The charts presented in this section are based on responses from other organizations in the {industryName} industry and are meant to inform and advise the target-creation process in your organization.
tab2.title: Benchmarking

tab1.intro: Prioritize opportunities for improvement based on expert feedback and other competitors.
tab1.title: Opportunities

tab1.intro: Select the organizations you wish to share the assessment with.
tab1.title: Share

tab2.intro: The assessment has been shared with the following organizations:
tab2.title: History
